title: Are there any free websites where I can post my physics doubts and get them solved? - Quora

response.answer_text: QUORA is best and others learning medium is STACK EXCHANGE where one can post their doubts and get them solved. Even you can post any type of doubt technical (phy, chem, bio, math, economics, arts …….) as well as personal. You will find lots of useful advices and recommendations on that topic.
